tool_description: Mobile Legends character API  An API to learn more about the history, skills and data of Mobile Legends characters.
name: Mobile Legends character API
title: Mobile Legends character API

api_list.name: Get character details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-legends-character-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/characters/Gord"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-legends-character-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-legends-character-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/characters/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-legends-character-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
